long_description: The lightweight Patagonia Summit Pants for infant and toddler girls are built of an durable, abrasion-resistant nylon with double fabric at the knees to stand up to your little one's army crawl. 100% nylon fabric is treated with a durable water resistant finish and offer 50+ sun protection. Elastic waistband with internal adjustment provides a belly-friendly fit; gusseted crotch lends mobility and comfortable room for a diaper. The Patagonia Summit Pants feature sturdy drop-in back pockets and a zippered fly with button closure.
short_description: The lightweight Patagonia Summit Pants for infant and toddler girls are built of an durable, abrasion-resistant nylon with double fabric at the knees to stand up to your little one's army crawl.
